languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Deadeye shots{/g} fired by this rifle deal an additional +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to larger enemies, i.e.:
-<indent=5%>Hulking creatures suffer +5 damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Enormous creatures suffer +10 damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Massive creatures suffer +15 damage.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
This rifle is crafted specifically for hunting large prey.
<indent=5%>+2 additional damage to big creatures, i.e. creatures that occupy more than 1 cell</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Deadeye shots{/g} fired by this rifle deal an additional +5 damage to larger enemies, i.e.:
-<indent=5%>Hulking creatures suffer +5 damage</indent>
-<indent=5%>Enormous creatures suffer +10 damage</indent>
-<indent=5%>Massive creatures suffer +15 damage</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Deadeye shots{/g} fired by this rifle deal an additional +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to larger enemies, i.e.:
-<indent=5%>Hulking creatures suffer +5 damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Enormous creatures suffer +10 damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Massive creatures suffer +15 damage.</indent>

languages.text:
这把步枪的{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}致命射击{/g}会对体型较大的敌人造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，体型每大一级，造成的伤害提高5点，即：
- <indent=5%>对大型生物造成的伤害提高5点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>对巨型生物造成的伤害提高10点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>对超巨型生物造成的伤害提高15点。</indent>

languages.text:
Los {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}disparos certeros{/g} de este rifle infligen +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por categoría de tamaño a los enemigos grandes:
-<indent=5%>Las criaturas grandes sufren +5 de daño.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Las criaturas enormes sufren +10 de daño.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Las criaturas descomunales sufren +15 de daño.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Ungeschlachte Kreaturen erleiden +5 Schaden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Riesige Kreaturen erleiden +10 Schaden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Gewaltige Kreaturen erleiden +15 Schaden.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Большие существа получают +5 урона.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Огромные существа получают +10 урона.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Гигантские существа получают +15 урона.</indent>
